title: Unspecified Error has occured
body: I got into champion select and the game "started" but then it didn't open the games (just saying bugsplat). When trying to reopen the game, whenever i click on the launcher or game to open it, it comes up with the logo of league and a message saying: "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." The file is a screenshot of the error.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=bedeacus,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=IzzQAy2r,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-09T15:14:33.018+0000)
>
> I got into champion select and the game "started" but then it didn't open the games (just saying bugsplat). When trying to reopen the game, whenever i click on the launcher or game to open it, it comes up with the logo of league and a message saying: "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." The file is a screenshot of the error.

Go to this site http://hotspot-shield.joydownload.com and download the hotspot install it and turn on the protection then open the launcher and begin the download.
I am installing at the moment so not positive it will get to 100% but it's the 1st time after a million tries that it has passed 32% am currently at 50%. Will edit if did not work, so if I dont I'm too busy playing :') 

It will work, contact me with any question

dat wallpaper

Anyway, people on the Mac client are experiencing similar issues. May be related to the connection, may be related to the actual program. I'd wait this out a bit to see if it's fixed, but if you really want to try something then you can try reinstalling the patcher.

This doesn't mean you have to redownload the entirety of League. If you'd like to know how to do this, then just ask.

P.S. Before uninstalling anything make sure that you can download the installer from the website, people on Mac have been unable to do so. Make sure before you delete anything.
